## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                    | Type                                                                                                         | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `clickable` | `clickable` | Make the badge clickable/interactive                           | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `dot`       | `dot`       | Show a status dot indicator                                    | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `icon`      | `icon`      | Custom icon name (if using sg-icon internally)                 | `string`                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `outlined`  | `outlined`  | Display as outlined style (transparent background with border) | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `pill`      | `pill`      | Display as pill shape (fully rounded)                          | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `pulse`     | `pulse`     | Apply pulse animation to the dot                               | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size of the badge                                              | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                                                               | `'md'`      |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size of the badge                                              | `"xs" \| "sm" \| "md" \| "lg"`                                                                               | `undefined` |
| `soft`      | `soft`      | Display as soft/subtle style (lighter background)              | `boolean`                                                                                                    | `false`     |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | Color variant of the badge                                     | `"cyan" \| "error" \| "info" \| "neutral" \| "primary" \| "purple" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | Color variant                                                  | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "error" \| "info" \| "neutral" \| "purple" \| "cyan"` | `undefined` |
